entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
